reviewerName: Richard C. Drew "Anaal Nathra/Uthe vas Bethod...
reviewtext: Simple to hook up and use. Includes an external power supply that the instructions say is optional, but that should be used.  The USB subsystem provides power to many of the accessories that attach to it (card readers, etc.) If you don't use the power supply, attaching more than two devices will overtax the USB system and stop all devices from working.  So use the power supply immediately and you're all set.  Great value, led's show port status.
summary: Trouble free and brainless to use
